title: lagged out, re-started launcher and it says can not use
body:
Was enjoying a game of aram just now only to get dropped due to lag, tried to reconnect to game but launcher froze.
so i closed and restarted launcher but the launch button is disabled and it says 'can not use' in red up in the right hand corner.
anyone else having this problem????

replies.body: It's likely you disconnected due to the server being taken offline to deploy Patch 6.16. Try logging in now!

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Ky21yhVE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-09T21:31:28.096+0000)
>
> It's likely you disconnected due to the server being taken offline to deploy Patch 6.16. Try logging in now!

thats what i have been thinking but when i checked server status there was nothing about server being offline due to patch
Odd. I'd ignore it if it happened just once, if it happens again though, don't hesitate to contact us!
